body:
so basically in this thread, you have to say who your favourite youtubers are and why. this thread is so others can see which youtubers are great or to just share why you love them!

for example:
my favourite youtubers are
danisnotonfire
dan has very relatable and funny videos, and he is very creative
amazingphil
phil has incredibly creative and funny videos and he is a very nice person
kidpov
ben is honestly one of my favourite people. he is the most creative youtuber ive watched and he even has a song, little game, that i wouldd definately recommend

so, go ahead!

replies.body: xNeatorio is my favorite YTuber. He's funny and pretty good at UHC. I have a soft spot for people who deserve so many more subscribers. When I found him out, he had around 1k subs. Now he has 40K! Totally don't sound like a hipster or anything, but it's the truth >.<
